dialogue.name: Yvyteph Disappointment
lines: Ah, here we are at the end together at last. How unfortunate that you were unable to bathe in passion as we directed you.
I don't know how our instructions could have been any clearer. Oh well, so it goes.

dialogue.name: Maya's Confusion
lines: But I... what? The big fella's dead; isn't that what I was up to?

dialogue.name: Qyvnily Rebuke
lines: Why would we want you to slay a monster for us? If we simply wanted him dead we would have done for him ourselves.
thoughts: I never wanted to slay anything. But killing comes upon us, I suppose, inevitable as the cold light of dawn.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Dismissal
lines: Nevermind the 'why' of your failure; all that matters now is that you have failed.
We are not without mercy, however, and we have learned a thing or two from our time with you; I will return you to Meigantu.
My priestesses there will decide what is to become of you, but I will instruct them to be kind. Relatively. A little.

transition.text: I don't like the sound of tha-!!!
